mapper.insert: insert into htc_dept_rela ( group_id , hos_id , copy_code , acc_year , plan_code , dept_id , proj_dept_id ) values ( #{group_id} , #{hos_id} , #{copy_code} , #{acc_year} , #{plan_code} , #{dept_id} , #{proj_dept_id} )
mapper.select: select hdr.group_id, hdr.hos_id, hdr.copy_code, hdr.acc_year, hdr.plan_code, hps.plan_name, hdr.dept_id, hdd.dept_no, hdd.dept_code, hdd.dept_name, hdr.proj_dept_id, hpdd.proj_dept_id, hpdd.proj_dept_code, hpdd.proj_dept_name from htc_dept_rela hdr left join htc_plan_set hps on hdr.group_id = hps.group_id and hdr.hos_id = hps.hos_id and hdr.copy_code = hps.copy_code and hdr.acc_year = hps.acc_year and hdr.plan_code = hps.plan_code left join hos_dept_dict hdd on hdd.group_id = hdr.group_id and hdd.hos_id = hdr.hos_id and hdd.dept_id = hdr.dept_id left join htc_proj_dept_dict hpdd on hpdd.group_id = hdr.group_id and hpdd.hos_id = hdr.hos_id and hpdd.proj_dept_id = hdr.proj_dept_id where hdr.group_id = #{group_id} and hdr.hos_id = #{hos_id} and hdr.copy_code = #{copy_code} and hdr.acc_year = #{acc_year} and hdd.is_stop = 0 and hpdd.is_disable = 0 and hdr.plan_code = #{plan_code} and hdr.dept_id = #{dept_id}
